net.sf.borg.model.db.jdbc

Class JdbcDBHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.borg.model.db.jdbc.JdbcDBHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DBHelper.Controller, DBHelper.Factory

    public class JdbcDBHelper
extends Object
implements DBHelper.Factory, DBHelper.Controller
    Helper class that provides a db factory and some db control functionality to packages outside of the jdbc package. This is the only functionality from the jdbc package that is visible to other packages
